chunk_id: Care During Pregnancy and Childbirth Training Manual for CHO at AB-HWC__chunk_153
source: Care During Pregnancy and Childbirth Training Manual for CHO at AB-HWC
text:
Educate the PW/family members about signs of labour and danger signs of obstetric complications, where 
to go if an emergency arises, and how to arrange for transportation, money, and blood donors in case of an 
emergency and entitlements under government schemes such as JSY, JSSK, PMSMA, SUMAN and PMVVY 
etc.
 ∙ Counselling on essential newborn care practices (breast feeding, keeping baby worm, neonatal sepsis)and 
clarify the myths/misconceptions about newborn care 
 ∙ If pregnant woman is HIV
